# plan

the test plan

## SYNOPSIS

    '  ' [--plan <>]

## README

Specify the test plan name. Often these match command names.
In reality, it is the name of the test plan file minus the `-test.sh`.

## COMMANDS

The following commands use this option.

* [test](../../commands/test/index.html)
